rows.text_1_facilitator:
Today's topic is about taking care of yourself.

Taking time for yourself helps you stay calm and strong.

text_1_facilitator.eng:
Today's topic is about taking care of yourself.

Taking time for yourself helps you stay calm and strong.

media_title.eng: How will caring for yourself help you and your family? Listen to find out

media_transcript.eng:
Greetings, everyone.

Today's topic is self-care.

There are times when we experience challenges, face problems and do not know what to do. It is important to take care of ourselves to learn the techniques for keeping ourselves calm, in case problems, challenges or issues come up.

When we are calm we are in a good state to think positively and come up with positive solutions to any challenges we may be facing.

rows.media_title: How will caring for yourself help you and your family? Listen to find out
rows.media_transcript:
Greetings, everyone.

Today's topic is self-care.

There are times when we experience challenges, face problems and do not know what to do. It is important to take care of ourselves to learn the techniques for keeping ourselves calm, in case problems, challenges or issues come up.

When we are calm we are in a good state to think positively and come up with positive solutions to any challenges we may be facing.

rows.text_1_facilitator:
Why self-care?

We often don’t look after ourselves enough. But this is so important, especially as a parent!

Reducing our stress and treating ourselves well helps us AND our teenagers.

text_1_facilitator.eng:
Why self-care?

We often don’t look after ourselves enough. But this is so important, especially as a parent!

Reducing our stress and treating ourselves well helps us AND our teenagers.

media_transcript.eng:
For me as a parent, it was almost impossible to find time for myself. I was always busy taking care of everyone else. Through @global.app_name, I realised how important it is to take care of myself. It helps me AND my family!

Having a moment for myself helps me to breathe and notice how I feel. Even 5 minutes to have a cup of tea makes a big difference. Now I can deal with my stress better.

rows.media_transcript:
For me as a parent, it was almost impossible to find time for myself. I was always busy taking care of everyone else. Through @global.app_name, I realised how important it is to take care of myself. It helps me AND my family!

Having a moment for myself helps me to breathe and notice how I feel. Even 5 minutes to have a cup of tea makes a big difference. Now I can deal with my stress better.

rows.text_1_facilitator:
Appreciating ourselves is one way to care for ourselves. 

Let’s give it a try.

text_1_facilitator.eng:
Appreciating ourselves is one way to care for ourselves. 

Let’s give it a try.

quiz_1_question.eng:
Think of one thing YOU have done well recently.

"Well done to me for..."

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng:
Say it aloud if you can.

Here is one thing you deserve praise for: Well done for using @global.app_name!

rows.text_1_facilitator:
Treating ourselves well is another way of looking after ourselves.

You can give yourself a small reward every day, and it does not have to cost a thing!

text_1_facilitator.eng:
Treating ourselves well is another way of looking after ourselves.

You can give yourself a small reward every day, and it does not have to cost a thing!

quiz_1_question.eng: What small thing makes you happy?

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: Nice! Taking care of yourself is an important parenting skill!

rows.text_1_facilitator: Here are some tips to help you take care of yourself.

text_1_facilitator.eng: Here are some tips to help you take care of yourself.

section_1_text.eng: Do a 30 second quick relaxation activity.

section_1_extra_text.eng:
Take a moment now to relax. Breathe in slowly as you count to three... and breathe out as you count to three. Feel your body relax with each breath. 

Try this whenever you are feeling stressed and need a break. A few calm breaths can make a big difference.

section_2_text.eng:
Think of one thing YOU have done well recently.

_"Well done to me for..."_

section_2_extra_text.eng:
It could be showing love to your children, helping them with schoolwork, or preparing a meal even when you felt tired. 

Every small effort you make matters, and you get to celebrate yourself.

section_3_text.eng: Remember, you deserve your “me time” too! What makes you happy?

section_3_extra_text.eng:
It could be something small, like enjoying a cup of tea, taking a short nap, chatting with a friend, or listening to your favourite music.

Spending time with your teen can be fun for you too! It might even make you feel less stressed.

section_4_text.eng: We all need a little help. You can take care of yourself better when you have help from the people around you — another caregiver, a friend, a neighbour, or a family member. Helping each other take small breaks makes self-care easier for everyone.

section_4_extra_text.eng:
Offer a moment of rest, help with a small task, or remind someone to slow down.
When caregivers and their support networks support one another, teens see that caring for yourself and others is a normal part of family life.

rows.section_1_extra_text:
Take a moment now to relax. Breathe in slowly as you count to three... and breathe out as you count to three. Feel your body relax with each breath.

rows.text_1_facilitator:
Remember: Small moments of self-care matter. This week, find time to relax, recognize your efforts, and reward yourself whenever you can.
 
Care for yourself every day. You deserve it!

text_1_facilitator.eng:
Remember: Small moments of self-care matter. This week, find time to relax, recognize your efforts, and reward yourself whenever you can.
 
Care for yourself every day. You deserve it!

quiz_1_question.eng: Can you find moments this week to relax, recognise your efforts, and reward yourself?

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: That's great! Every small step you take to care for yourself makes a big difference for your family.

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: That’s a good start! Look for small ways to relax, recognise your efforts, and reward yourself - even little moments of self-care can make a big difference.

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: That's okay. Try choosing one small, simple action like taking a deep breath or sitting quietly for a moment. Every little bit counts!

rows.quiz_1_question: Can you find moments this week to relax, recognise your efforts, and reward yourself?
rows.quiz_1_feedback_1: That's great! Every small step you take to care for yourself makes a big difference for your family.
rows.quiz_1_feedback_2: That’s a good start! Look for small ways to relax, recognise your efforts, and reward yourself - even little moments of self-care can make a big difference.
rows.quiz_1_feedback_3: That's okay. Try choosing one small, simple action like taking a deep breath or sitting quietly for a moment. Every little bit counts!

rows.text_1_facilitator:
Remember, taking small moments for self-care helps us stay calm, strong, and connected to our families. 

When we look after ourselves, we are better able to support our teens!

text_1_facilitator.eng:
Remember, taking small moments for self-care helps us stay calm, strong, and connected to our families. 

When we look after ourselves, we are better able to support our teens!

media_title.eng: Remember @data.characters.media_male_1.name? Here’s what his son says about his father practising self care

media_transcript.eng:
My dad was always busy. He would come home from work and snap at us when we started asking him questions.

@global.app_name helped us a lot. We no longer fight. Now, when my dad comes home, he first sits down by himself for 5 minutes and then we do a relaxing activity from @global.app_name together, so we can all take a deep breath and relax. Then we can chat about our day, about anything good or bad that happened. Everyone is so much happier now.

rows.media_title: Remember @data.characters.media_male_1.name? Here’s what his son says about his father practising self care
rows.media_transcript:
My dad was always busy. He would come home from work and snap at us when we started asking him questions.

@global.app_name helped us a lot. We no longer fight. Now, when my dad comes home, he first sits down by himself for 5 minutes and then we do a relaxing activity from @global.app_name together, so we can all take a deep breath and relax. Then we can chat about our day, about anything good or bad that happened. Everyone is so much happier now.

rows.text_2: Well done! You completed the module!

text_2.eng: Well done! You completed the module!

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: That’s great to hear! Keep doing what helps you feel strong. Even small moments for yourself make a big difference.

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: Thanks for checking in. “Okay” is a good start. maybe try one small thing today just for you, like a short break or deep breath.

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: I’m glad you shared that. Remember, self-care keeps you strong for yourself and your family. Try one calming thing from this module or talk to someone you trust.
